openwebui_variables.name: COMFYUI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the API key for ComfyUI.

openwebui_variables.name: COMFYUI_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the URL to the ComfyUI image generation API.

openwebui_variables.name: COMFYUI_WORKFLOW_NODES
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the ComfyUI workflow node mappings for image generation.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_EDIT_ENGINE
openwebui_variables.description: Configures the engine used for image editing operations, enabling modification of existing images using text prompts.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_EDIT_MODEL
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the model to use for image editing operations within the selected engine.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_EDIT_SIZE
openwebui_variables.description: Defines the output dimensions for edited images in WIDTHxHEIGHT format (e.g., 1024x1024). Leave empty to preserve original dimensions.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_EDIT_COMFYUI_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Configures the ComfyUI base URL for image editing operations, enabling self-hosted ComfyUI workflows for image manipulation.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_EDIT_COMFYUI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Provides authentication for ComfyUI image editing API requests when the ComfyUI instance requires API key authentication.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_EDIT_COMFYUI_WORKFLOW
openwebui_variables.description: Defines the ComfyUI workflow configuration in JSON format for image editing operations. Must include nodes for image input, prompt, and output. Export from ComfyUI using 'Save (API Format)'.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_EDIT_COMFYUI_WORKFLOW_NODES
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the ComfyUI workflow node mappings for image editing, defining which nodes handle image input, prompt, model, dimensions, and other parameters. Configured automatically via the admin UI.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_GENERATION_ENGINE
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the engine to use for image generation.
